title: Jennifer Lawrence seen leaving a downtown restaurant with her soon-to-be-husband Cooke Maroney
text:
The high end activities continue for this couple, ahead of their impending nuptials.

Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence was seen with her fiancé Cooke Maroney on Friday night, leaving a downtown restaurant after dinner.

Maroney, 33, was decked out in varying shades of blue, and carried a paper takeout bag.

Soon to be wed: Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence was seen with her fiancé Cooke Maroney on Friday night, leaving a downtown restaurant after dinner

Before dinner, the Silver Linings Playbook star was also seen getting a haircut at Serge Normant, after spending some time at a skin clinic.

Lawrence, 29, is preparing for her impending nuptials to Maroney, which are happening any day now.

On Friday, she wore a red plaid button up underneath a red and brown Prada coat that she held closed to keep herself warm.

The Oscar winning actress kept it casual in a pair of black pants and black slides while carrying a black bucket purse.

Lovebirds: Jennifer's hair was down later in the evening for a more evening-inspired look

Before dinner: The Silver Linings Playbook star was also seen getting a haircut at Serge Normant, after spending some time at a skin clinic

Her hair was down later in the evening for a more evening-inspired look.

Lawrence is understandably getting very excited to tie the knot with her art gallerist beau.

'He's just the best person I've ever met in my whole life,' Lawrence said during an interview with Entertainment Tonight.

On their way: Lawrence is understandably getting very excited to tie the knot with her art gallerist beau, gushing to the media that 'it was a very, very easy decision'

'It was a very, very easy decision,' she said of their decision to wed.

Back at the end of September, she shared her Amazon wedding registry with fans with a list of all things perfect for hosting, cooking, travel and more.

'Planning a wedding is so exciting, but it can be overwhelming. For anyone else needing a little inspiration, I thought it would be fun to collaborate with Amazon to share a few of my favorite registry wish-list items. It's so easy, and you can find everything you need all in one place,' she said about her registry.

Busy woman: Jennifer stepped out on Friday morning in New York just days before her wedding to give her skin some TLC

Cold day: She wore a red and brown patterned Prada coat that she held closed to keep herself warm

The two lovebirds got engaged at just under a year of dating after being introduced by mutual friends.

They are constantly spotted hand-in-hand while out on dates or strolling through the city.

Prior to their relationship, the Joy star split from her ex Darren Aronofsky. Darren was the director of her movie mother! and they grew close while filming it, but later parted ways back in November 2017.
description: Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence was seen with her fiancé Cooke Maroney on Friday night, leaving a downtown restaurant after dinner.
